AFTER:
info['feRelations'] = PrettyList()

        for sub in elt:
            if sub.tag.endswith('FERelation'):
                ferel = self._handle_elt(sub)
                ferel['_type'] = 'ferelation'
                ferel['frameRelation'] = info   # backpointer
                info['feRelations'].append(ferel)

        return info
